actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of a national cemetery on Long Island, N. Y.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Navy to transfer approximately 900 acres from the Naval Weapons Reserve Plant in Long Island, New York, to the Administration of Veterans' Affairs to be used as a national cemetery. Authorizes the appropriation of such sums as may be necessary to carry out the purpose of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the establishment of a national cemetery on Long Island, N. Y.
